summary: Re-texture of the Chaurus, added detail and color.
descriptionHtml:
MOD BY: McMUFFINMARAUDER
----------------
1. INFO
2. INSTALLATION
3. UNINSTALLATION
----------------
1. Info

Detailed Chaurus

This mod was created by McMuffinMarauder, It is a re-texture of the creature; Chaurus. Adds detail and color.
Enjoy (:

2. Installation

Extract the texture folder into your: Skyrim\\data\\ archive.

3. Uninstallation

 Open the texture folder in your skyrim\\data\\ archive and delete \"Chaurus\" in the actor sub-folder.

Thanks for downloading the Detailed Chaurus\' Mod, please endorse!

4. Notes

You have my permission to edit/use this file in anyway, just give credit to me where it is due :D.

----------------
-McMuffinMarauder
author: McMuffinMarauder
